Title: No additional discounts or promotion codes can be applied for items from the On sale category

Steps.1: Go to Home page of Silicon Sofas
Steps.2: Click On sale Navigation bar category
Steps.3: Click any product at that page
Steps.4: lick the icon to add the product to the cart
Steps.6: Enter the promocode for the item from On sale category

Expected result: No additional discounts or promotion codes are applied for items from the On sale category.
